name: OtherHealthcareFacilities
title: Other Healthcare Facilities
description:
Plan to apply for SMCT facility codes as follows: Extended or Intermediate Care Facility (ECF/ICF
Psychiatric Hospital or Psychiatric Unit of a Hospital
Transitional Care Unit (TCU) 
Veterans Home
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains procedures used to represent the discharge of a patient to another healthcare facility.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify the final place or setting to which the patient was discharged on the day of discharge from a particular inpatient encounter. This particular value set intends to identify patients who where discharged to another healthcare facility. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular value set is used with the Attribute of "Discharge status" used with the "Encounter" category.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains codes defining Long Term Acute Care Hospital (LTACH) 
Nursing Home or Facility including Veteran's Administration Nursing Facility
Rehabilitation Facility including Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility/Hospital or Rehabilitation Unit of a Hospital
Skilled Nursing Facility (SNF), Sub-Acute Care or Swing Bed),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Patient transfer to skilled nursing facility (procedure)

contains.display: Patient transfer to skilled nursing facility (procedure)
